highlighted_projects.description: Designed the interface of a website using HTML and CSS, which was built as a guide for the travellers to the Great Wall of China.
highlighted_projects.name: The Great Wall Traveller Guide

highlighted_projects.description: Built a Java application with simple GUI to do basic investing, like buying and selling stock.
highlighted_projects.name: Java Investing App

jarvis_projects.description: Built an application to gather the hardware and usage information of a Linux system using bash scripts, and store them in a table using RDBMS and PSQL.
jarvis_projects.name: Cluster Monitor

name: Barbod Rouzbahani

others.title: Awards

professional_experience.description: Developing a Java application to mimic the Linux grep command to search for a given string.

professional_experience.description: Helped customers with their needs, such as shipping, printing, and taking photos.
professional_experience.title: Customer Service and Sales Assistance

summary: I am Barbod, almost 23 years old, and I love to help people with the skills I have. I have a Bachelor of Computer Science from the University of Guelph, and I am passionate about designing and developing websites, and playing Water Polo!
